gov.va.med.srcalc.vista

Interface VistaPatientDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RpcVistaPatientDao

    public interface VistaPatientDao

    Data Access Object for VistA Patients.

    This is an interface to allow for easy mocking. See RpcVistaPatientDao for the "real" implementation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  VistaPatientDao.SaveNoteCode
      Enumerates the possible responses from VistA for saving a risk calculation note.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> HEALTH_FACTORS_SET
      This is a list of the only health factors that should be displayed for the users.
      static int MAX_LINE_LENGTH
      The maximum amount of characters allowed on a line before wrapping the line onto a new line.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Patient getPatient(int dfn)
      Loads a Patient from VistA given his/her DFN.
      VistaPatientDao.SaveNoteCode saveRiskCalculationNote(int patientDfn, java.lang.String electronicSignature, java.lang.String noteBody)
      Saves the finished calculation to VistA, given the patient, electronic signature, and the note body.

    • Field Detail

      • HEALTH_FACTORS_SET

        static final java.util.Set<java.lang.String> HEALTH_FACTORS_SET
        This is a list of the only health factors that should be displayed for the users. This list was created by the VA.

      • MAX_LINE_LENGTH

        static final int MAX_LINE_LENGTH
        The maximum amount of characters allowed on a line before wrapping the line onto a new line.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getPatient

        Patient getPatient(int dfn)
        Loads a Patient from VistA given his/her DFN. This includes the patient's vitals and available lab measurements.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - if any error occurs communicating with VistA

      • saveRiskCalculationNote

        VistaPatientDao.SaveNoteCode saveRiskCalculationNote(int patientDfn,
                                                   java.lang.String electronicSignature,
                                                   java.lang.String noteBody)
        Saves the finished calculation to VistA, given the patient, electronic signature, and the note body. Each line of the noteBody is wrapped at MAX_LINE_LENGTH characters so that the note is easily visible in CPRS without horizontal scrolling.
        Parameters:
        patientDfn - the DFN of the patient
        noteBody -
        Returns:
        one of the VistaPatientDao.SaveNoteCode return codes
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - if any error occurs communicating with VistA
